description: Assist in teaching 200+ students per quarter by holding weekly office hours and guiding them through reasoning, designing, and debugging full-stack apps using React, NodeJS, and MochaJS
Contribute course materials and content to reinforce core concepts such as debugging, documentation, testing, and reasoning
Worked with a team to maintain and update course infrastructure such as autograder and course website
Built and extended a web-based education platform using Flask, MySQL, and Alembic, for centralizing education materials for 1000+ students in lab courses
Develop software to connect simulations and digital-twins to physical hardware to promote accessibility of lab materials
Collaborate with research group to optimize code, design migrations, and document systems supporting lab research and teaching
